messages.title: ANDREW'S PRIORITIES FOR HUDDERSFIELD
messages.content: Addressing the climate emergency, Putting Huddersfield First, Protecting our Green spaces.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Climate crisis is the greatest problem we face. Other parties only offer words. We have the policies to ensure a greener future for all.
Our town is being left behind. We need to ensure public services are well financed, well run and services are provided locally by employers paying the living wage.
Our countryside is under assault from greedy developers. We need planning policies that give more control to our local communities.

leaflet.personalStatement: "This general election isn't just about Brexit – this is about the country we live in. Only a Green vote will prevent climate chaos, transform Britain and ensure the British people have a final say on Brexit, and elect more Green MPs that you can trust to keep the other parties honest. The time is now – please vote Green. Vote for Andrew Cooper" - CAROLINE LUCAS MP

images.caption: Your Green Party Candidate Andrew Cooper

leaflet.additionalNotes: Promoted by Andrew Cooper at 76 Brooklands Lane, Honley, Holmfirth HD9 6D. Printed on FSC sustainable paper by Sochall Smith Graphic Design. 72 Penn Lane, Foothill, Shipley, BD18 4BY.
